original_text: Nobody wrote down that Melchizedek had a father or a mother. Nobody wrote down that he had any ancestors. Nobody wrote about when he was born or when he died. In that way, it seems like Melchizedek was a priest for ever. He is like the Son of God who continues to be a priest for all time.
korean_text: 아버지도 없고 어머니도 없고 족보도 없고 시작한 날도 없고 생명의 끝도 없어 하나님의 아들과 닮아서 항상 제사장으로 있느니라

sentences.original_text: Nobody wrote down that Melchizedek had a father or a mother.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 멜기세덱에게 아버지나 어머니가 있었다고 기록하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Nobody wrote down that he had any ancestors.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그에게 조상이 있었다고 기록하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Nobody wrote about when he was born or when he died.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그가 언제 태어나고 언제 죽었는지 기록하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: In that way, it seems like Melchizedek was a priest for ever.
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 방식으로, 멜기세덱은 영원한 제사장처럼 보입니다.

sentences.original_text: He is like the Son of God
who continues to be a priest for all time.
sentences.korean_translation: 계속해서 모든 시간 동안 제사장으로 머무는 분입니다.
